entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
